How many people are affected by sudden infant death with dysgenesis of the testes syndrome ?,SIDDT has been diagnosed in more than 20 infants from a single Old Order Amish community in Pennsylvania. The condition has not been reported outside this community.,GHR,sudden infant death with dysgenesis of the testes syndrome
